snippet.title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning is a brand new single-player open world RPG coming to the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC. Designed by Ken Rolston, lead designer of Oblivion and Morrowind, Reckoning combines intense third person action combat with deep exploration, expansive character development, and immersive storytelling in a unique universe.  Gamers are mysteriously resurrected from the dead, without a fate and thrust into a bloody conflict between multiple races, factions, and alliances as they battle to stop evil forces that threaten to destroy the world.

http://www.ReckoningTheGame.com
http://www.Facebook.com/ReckoningTheGame
http://www.Twitter.com/ReckoningGame
